attributes.additional_details: There is no need for the privatisation of the channel. "It is self-sufficient and successful, making no drain on the public purse. It also plays a vital role in the broadcasting ecosystem, not least in commissioning programmes from more independent production companies, and more small independent production companies, than any other public service broadcaster.”
attributes.background: Leave Channel 4 the way it is currently run and funded. Drop the privatisation of the channel.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
